data.title: Laura Fraser Height
data.meta_description: Laura Fraser height is 5ft 1  or 154.9 cm tall. Discover more Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Cliff said on 13/Aug/13

In the 1st episode of Breaking Bad's final season, there's a scene at the car wash where Anna Gunn (Skylar) comes up and threatens Laura's character (Lydia). The height difference between the two ladies (both in heels) was pretty extreme - easily 9 inches, as Anna was looking way down at her. Very intimidating. I'll say she's likely 5'1".

Lo sgozzatore said on 15/Jan/13

Could she be just 5'1? She looked so short on Breaking Bad. Dean Norris looked tall in comparison (and she had big heels)
